mapper.select: select status from copy where copy_id = ${copy_id}
select copy_id from copy where call_number=#{call_number}
select c.copy_id, b.title, c.location, c.call_number, c.status, c.isbn from copy c join books b on b.isbn=c.isbn where c.copy_id = #{copy_id}

select c.copy_id, c.call_number, c.location, c.status, chk.due_date from copy c left join (select * from checkout where return_date is null) chk on c.copy_id = chk.copy_id join books b on c.isbn = b.isbn where b.isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.insert: insert into copy (copy_id, isbn, call_number, location, status) values (copy_id_seq.nextval, #{isbn}, #{call_number}, #{location}, #{status})
